subject: Marketing
title: Right to Be Forgotten
description: One-minute skill: Right to Be Forgotten.

hook.text: A man's decade-old bankruptcy still appeared in Google results. It ruined his job prospects.

buildup.text: Digital information persists forever. Past mistakes follow people across the internet.

discovery.text: The EU's right to be forgotten lets individuals request removal of outdated personal data.

twist.text: Marketers who collect data create records that may haunt customers for decades.

climax.text: Ethical data practices include not just collection limits but deletion responsibilities.

punchline.text: Collecting data is a privilege, not a right.

quiz.question: What does the right to be forgotten allow individuals to do?
options: Request removal of outdated personal data from search results
Delete all internet content about any topic
Prevent companies from ever collecting their data
